About the Company: Regency Ceramics Ltd is the market leader in the floor-tile segment in the country.Regency Tiles come in a myriad of colors and hues for floors and walls - Glazed, Vitrified, Industrial and Heavy duty, Pavement Tiles, Floor and Wall Concepts, Exterior elevation Tiles, heavy duty tiles and much more -a range that encompasses easily the very best the industry can provide.The product range of the ocmpany includes Wall Tiles,Vitrified Tiles,Floor Tiles and Pavement Tiles.
